title: Not promoted?
body: I just won my last game to my Silver promos but i didn't get promoted? I bug splatted AFTER the game was finished, i even have the win in my match history, but no promotion...

replies.body: I looked into your games and see that you've won 2 games so far.  You need to win a 3/5 because you are in promotion to a new tier, not division.  Let me know if that clears things up!, and good luck!
Same here. won my division promos 2/3 yet its still on 1/3
